articles.title: Sams defends nine in final over as MI stun GT | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Bottom-placed Mumbai Indians keep their IPL 2022 alive - only just - as GT suffer their third defeat of the season
articles.content:
Mumbai Indians stayed alive in IPL 2022 by the skin of their teeth after holding their nerve in a five-run win over table toppers Gujarat Titans.
